answers.answer: I feel like a walrus but other than that I feel ok.my due date is the 9th but I think we're going to have her soon.  I'm hoping for this weekend but I don't think I'll last more than a week.  I can't wait!

My actual due date is May 25th, but the doc is thinking about inducing on the 19th since I have gestational diabetes.  I feel pretty good though, not too miserable, have had no swelling and have only gained 23 lbs.  I'm ready for her arrival though, yet nervous at the same time.  This is our first child.

Hey ladies!!! we are finally IN MAY!!! YAY!!!!!I saw this morning the calendar and could barely believe it.... we got to THE month!!! =)My due date is the 6th... but i really think we'll go overdue since there are no changes as of now... =( we'll see.... any body ever go over due???Good luck to all!!!!

Happy May, Ladies! My due date is May 25th. Time to get some final organization going and start checking things off my "to do" list . . . plus get going on those items not yet accomplished: choose names, wash baby clothes, unbox new car seat, make freezer meals, pack hospital bag, wrap up as many work projects as possible, have at least one more prenatal massage, etc. etc. etc. Yikes!Best wishes to everyone due soon!

I know that I am ready to get this child here.  I am going in on the 15th.  I hope that I go into labor sooner though.  As of Wednesday there were no changes in my cervex. :(   I was really hoping to get the ball rolling.
i have until the 27th and am completely miserable with this pregnancy. I cant wait to get this one over with.

question: How is everyone doing and when is everyone expected to deliver?  I am scheduled for May 15th.  YEA!!!!  Only 2 weeks.  I am counting the days.
title: Well ladies, we are getting close!!!
